attributes.action: Change the UK voting system to proportional representation.
attributes.additional_details:
The Labour Party won the election with only 19% vote share.
This is not true democracy and needs to be changed
attributes.background: The current "first past the post" system does not represent a reflection of true democracy

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Referendum on changing the Electoral System To Proportional Representation (PR)
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700109
